Definition.WordDefinition: rarified adj 1: having low density; "rare gasses"; "lightheaded from the rarefied mountain air" [syn: {rare}, {rarefied}] 2: reserved for an elite group [syn: {rarefied}] 3: of high moral or intellectual value; elevated in nature or style; "an exalted ideal"; "argue in terms of high-flown ideals"- Oliver Franks; "a noble and lofty concept" [syn: {exalted}, {high-flown}, {high-minded}, {lofty}, {rarefied}, {idealistic}, {noble-minded}]
